name: RND
short_description:
Create:

• huge text files
• ASCII data stream.

Example uses - generate:

• specific number of characters for testing web forms
• restricted range character stream
• control characters for testing application input and resilience
• custom text strings as content filler
• very long password strings

• specific file size (e.g. 1024 bytes, 10 MB, 1 GB)
• huge files (5GB+, 64-bit version)
• files for integrity, processing, hashing, network and benchmarking tests.

RND.zip contains the source code and the x86/x64 executables for Linux, Windows, Raspberry Pi.
summary: Random data generator: secure character stream or large file export
